name: mtoto overalls
notes:
mtoto overalls in danish: https://strikkeglad.dk/47715/mtoto-overalls/

simple loose-fit baby overalls make the best present for a newborn! sizes available from newborn (56cm) to 12 months (80cm). 

**3/4/2016**: english pattern uploaded & finished chest measurements added to finnish pdf! please let me know if you find any mistakes or have any problems with the pattern.

**3/14/2016**: a few errors corrected in both english & finnish pdf's!
